text:
@CNN COVID-19 IS LIKE A BOX OF CHOCOLATES U NEVER KNOW W UR GONNA GET

It might be mild or it may be deadly. It could even be asymptomatic

1 thing is for sure, sooner or later, we're all gonna get it

Everyday I'm making preparations. Preparing for the worst, but hoping for the best!
